firstStep.title: Step 1 - Contact
firstStep.description: Contact us on WhatsApp, by email or by phone.

secondStep.title: Step 2 - Estimate
secondStep.description: Send us a photo to allow us to estimate <important>a fixed and clear price, agreed in advance</important> for your problem, which will not change during the intervention.

thirdStep.title: Step 3 - Appointment
thirdStep.description: I will come to help you out, or we will arrange an appointment together depending on the service.
